preferences.name: allowedProtocols
preferences.description: Array (as string) of schemes which are permitted to request privileges.
preferences.title: Allowed protocols

preferences.name: allowedWebsites
preferences.description: Array (as string) of websites which are explicitly permitted to request privileges.
preferences.title: Allowed websites

preferences.name: allowedWebsitesApproved
preferences.description: Array (as string) of websites which are explicitly permitted to request privileges and have done so, and user granted them.
preferences.title: Allowed and approved websites

preferences.name: allowAllProtocols
preferences.description: Boolean of whether to allow privilege requests to be made from any protocol (and thus any website)
preferences.title: Allow all protocols

preferences.name: allowAllWebsites
preferences.description: Boolean of whether to allow privilege requests to be made from all websites with approved protocols
preferences.title: Allow all websites whose protocols are approved

preferences.name: addons
preferences.description: Object (as string) whose keys are the websites which are permitted to launch in a hidden window on browser restart with privileges and whose values are meta-data about the 'addon'.
preferences.title: Addons

name: asyouwish
author: Brett Zamir
description: Inject AsYouWish global with requestPrivs() method as a wrapper for require() of SDK modules (and in the future, possibly custom modules) to provide a uniform means to website authors of requesting escalated privileges from users.
